mapper.select: SELECT ur.id, ur.user_id AS userId, ur.role_id AS roleId, r.role_name AS roleName FROM t_user_role ur JOIN t_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id AND r.del_status = 0 WHERE ur.del_status = 0
SELECT tr.id, tr.role_name AS label FROM t_user_role ur JOIN t_role tr ON ur.role_id = tr.id AND tr.del_status = 0 WHERE ur.del_status = 0 AND user_id = #{userId}
